programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.desc: Ants on a Log and a Cheating Winker: Missy steps up, Mary has a surprise for George, and Sheldon finds his dorm occupied. (S7 Ep4)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Frankenstein's Monster and a Crazy Church Guy: Sheldon helps his roommate on the stock market, Missy and Billy have a party, and Mary finds a new church. (S7 Ep5)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Finding Fizbo: Cam is enraged when he sees a clip of someone desecrating his beloved Fizbo costume, so he sets out on a quest to restore Fizbo's good name. (S8 Ep15)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Basketball!: Phil's been doing basketball training so that he can redeem himself at the annual charity game. Then NBA stars Charles Barkley and DeAndre Jordan turn up... (S8 Ep16)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Sex, Pies and Idiot Scrapes: Homer and Flanders become bounty hunters. Marge gets a job at an erotic bakery. (S20 Ep1/21)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lost Verizon: When Bart finds Denis Leary's phone and uses it to make prank calls and accept job offers, Denis comes up with a creative punishment for him. (S20 Ep2/21)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Confidence Erosion: Sheldon and Amy try to use maths to make their wedding planning less stressful. Raj falls out with Howard. (S11 Ep10)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Celebration Reverberation: Sheldon and Howard plan birthday celebrations for Amy and Halley. Leonard is stressed by a Christmas letter from his brother. (S11 Ep11)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Matrimonial Metric: Sheldon and Amy secretly test their friends, to work out who should be best man and maid of honour at their wedding. (S11 Ep12)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer's Paternity Coot: The Simpsons receive a long-lost letter, which suggests that Homer's biological father is actually British treasure hunter Mason Fairbanks. (S17 Ep10/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: I'm Spelling as Fast as I Can: Lisa wins a place at the Spellympics National Spelling Bee but discovers that it's not as clean-cut a competition as she thought. (S14 Ep12/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Italian Bob: On a trip to Italy to find Mr Burns a new sports car, the Simpsons get stranded in a village where Sideshow Bob reigns as mayor. (S17 Ep8/22)

programme.title: New: Below Deck
programme.desc: Brand new series - It's Always Sunny in Grenada: Conflict is rife as Barbie pushes boundaries, Cat struggles to find her place, and Jared's personal challenges take their toll. (S11 Ep4/17)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers have been watching Britain's Got Talent, Scared of the Dark, Obsession, Family Fortunes, Love Is Blind, Inside the Factory and BBC News (nurses strikes). (S21 Ep9)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: On the box this time: I'm a Celebrity... South Africa, Married at First Sight Australia, Obsession, Britain's Got Talent, ITV News (government phone alarm) and more. (S21 Ep10)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Welsh hairdresser Jess wants a man who's a cut above the rest. Charity shop manager Casey has his dream white wedding all mapped out. But is his date husband material? (S13 Ep6)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bad Fish Paradigm: Penny opens up to a reluctant Sheldon after a less-than-stellar first date with Leonard, putting him in the awkward position of having to keep a secret. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Codpiece Topology: Seeing Penny out on a date with another guy sends a distressed Leonard rushing back to Leslie Winkle, much to Sheldon's dismay. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Battle in the Boscage: Dr. Don't and Dr. Babbles - flanked by Eggforcers and captive tech guru, Nine - search the Boscage Maze for its prism shard. And Sonic has the same plan, too. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a live dinosaur in 'A Dinosaur in Dimmadelphia', then in 'Fearless', Hazel wishes that Jasmine was fearless. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Dog Day After-School: Desperate to get Mom's tablet back after it is confiscated at school, Billy and Nora get help from Phoebe, who wants to prove she can be as sneaky as Max. (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Original Prankster: Despite promising his girlfriend he would stop pranking, Max pulls an epic gag which his friend is about to get expelled for. (S3, ep 21)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Text, Lies, & Video: When a video of Henry and Ray transforming into Kid Danger and Captain Man gets out, Henry must get it back so that his secret identity isn't revealed. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Opposite Universe: Henry and Charlotte are transported into an opposite universe where Ray and Schwoz are evil and want to destroy Piper. They must figure out how to get back. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Badika: Anika is noticeably different now she's 'Badika' but will the others realise there's anything wrong? Oliver, Jasmyn and Florian skip out on their chores and get an unexpected lead. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Underwater Cleanup: Seeing Sushi's collection of shells, the Buffycats run to the river to look for more, but there's a terrible surprise waiting for them: the river is full of trash! (S2, ep 36)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Snack Time at the Farm: After a snack at the park, Pilou, Ginny and Bucky's tummies hurt. Luckily, Mimì, the pediatrician cat, is around! (S2, ep 37)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Space Rescue: The Cats in Black secret headquarters receives a call for help: it's Astricat, the alien kitty, who is in trouble in outer space. (S2, ep 38)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Bester uncovers undelicious ocurrences in 'Donut Disturb', then in 'The Cursed Amulet', Best and Bester dig up Captain Ironfoot's Cursed Amulet, only to find that Belle wants it too. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds a good book which happens to be SpongeBob's private diary, in 'Little Yellow Book', and then in 'Bumper to Bumper', Mrs. Puff is again teaching SpongeBob to drive.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab in 'Eek, An Urchin!', and then in 'Squid's Defense', Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel switches bodies with Papa Smurf in 'Smurfing Places', then in 'Poet Slam', after Poet mentors Lily in rhyming, he experiences poet-block during the poet slam contest. (S1, ep 26)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When Smurfette rescues Brainy from a snake, the others ask her to teach them "Smurf-Fu', then in 'Diaper Daddy', everyone is tired of changing Baby's diapers, Handy invents a robot to help.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob embarks on an epic journey to have his spatula reforged in 'Spatula of the Heavens', and then in 'Gary's Playhouse', SpongeBob builds a snail-house for Gary to play in while he is at work.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick messes with the space-time continuum in 'The Patterfly Effect', then in 'A Space Affair to Remember', Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Ghost of a Chance: The full Chaos Council gears up for all-out war in Ghost Hill. Shadow worries about leaving Nine to rebuild the prism. Sonic insists Nine is a friend. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe's a Clone Now: When Phoebe becomes too busy, Max helps her by creating a clone so she can be in two places at once. But the clone starts making trouble for the real Phoebe! (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Balloons of Doom: When Dr. Minyak takes the Man Fans hostage, Captain Man and Kid Danger have to find a way to rescue them without Dr. Minyak seeing them move. (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs take some nature lessons in 'Back to Nature', then in 'Okey-Dokey!', Jokey has a new prank - giving Grouchy a potion that makes him say okey dokey to every request. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf wants to prove that alchemy is more powerful than magic in 'Smurfy Magic Duel', then in 'Doctor Brainy & Mister Dumb', Brainy's new invention backfires and leaves him brainless. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends the team to find some more in 'Mustard O' Mine', then in 'Shopping List ', SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night in 'Whale Watching', then in 'Krusty Kleaners', after spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to clean the entire building!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Louds rent a boat for a day trip on the lake in 'Washed Up', then in 'Recipe for Disaster', Lincoln and Clyde investigate when they discover a frozen food company using Dad's recipes. (S4, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Loud kids seek the perfect gift in 'Present Tense', then in 'Any Given Sundae', Lily hears her parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert disasters. (S4, ep 7

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina go undercover to investigate a corrupt novelty product factory in 'Patrickle Jokes', then in 'Pat Roast', The Patrick Show presents The Roast of Patrick Star. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina follow a runaway idea brick into Randomland in 'All Out of Idea Bricks', then in 'A Fool Schooled', the family provide home-schooling for Patrick. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Revenge of the Smith: Excited to be honoured for their heroism with a school mural, Phoebe and Max learn that the artist holds a grudge and the tribute isn't what they imagined. (S4, ep 16)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Thumb Buddies: Captain Man and Kid Danger get jealous when a new crime-fighting team emerges in Swellview. Guest starring Jerry Trainor. (S4, ep 13)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy has invented a machine that allows him to understand animals in 'What the bear said', then in 'Parallel Worlds', Clumsy and Dimwitty open up a portal with other worlds. (S3, ep 12)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Bubble goes on an adventure with Firefly in 'Wobbly Tooth', then in 'The Darkest Night', Gargamel creates a switch that can turn off all the lights so that he can find the Smurf village. (S3, ep 13)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Clyde has a chance to study in France in 'Don't Escar-go', then in 'Double Trouble', Lola and Lana take on Cheryl and Meryl to be crowned the new spokespeople for Auntie Pam's Parlour. (S6, ep 2)

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.desc: Pan is Born! Goku Goes on a Training Journey!: Gohan's daughter is born, and Chi-Chi refuses to let her become a martial artist. Bulma reveals where Vegeta has been training. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: Benson and the Beast: After meeting Dr. Emilia and the Human Resistance, Kipo and her team go back to their headquarters to try to help Kipo get her strength and courage back. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
programme.desc: Roll With It: The princesses brainstorm ways to protect a fortress from the Horde. Meanwhile, Scorpia struggles with a special mission given to her directly by Catra. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Miraculous:...
programme.desc: ...Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir. Terrificator: Marinette's class has to make a short horror film, but the lead actress is too scared to play her part. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Miraculous:...
programme.desc: ...Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir. The Puppeteer: Marinette is looking after Manon once again. But things get a bit hectic when Manon is falsely accused of stealing a doll. (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Zombizou: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Miss Bustier, now Zombizou. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Captain Hardrock: Ladybug faces Juleka's mother, now Captain Hardrock. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Boogey Nightmare: Twyla must complete a rite of passage by pursuing a Night Terror through her friends' nightmares. (S1 Ep40)

programme.title: Annedroids
programme.desc: Annebots: A mysterious robotics scientist named Ada visits the junkyard and takes a special interest in Anne. Ada offers Anne a tour of her robotics lab. (S2 Ep12)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Art of Illusion: During a training, Corto meets Gavinda Teach, leader of the Mirages and Whale's rival. Teach uses that time to lure Corto into using her technology... (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: High Voltage Bear Attack: The lemmings are having a party, but when Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river he sparks a power cut! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Scents: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the ranger's cabin. Can he bring them to her without the lemmings ruining them? (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Scents: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the ranger's cabin. Can he bring them to her without the lemmings ruining them? (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Luck: After making a fool of himself in front of she-bear, Grizzy finds a four-leaf clover which seems to bring him good luck. Could his chance be changing? (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Magnetic Bear: Grizzy can't believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves, but it's the lemmings who are playing around. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Power Rangers: Dino Fury
programme.desc: Rafkon Revealed: The Ranger teens head to Rafkon to stop Lord Zedd, but because of a prophecy, Aiyon takes unnecessary risks. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Pokémon Ultimate Journeys: The...
programme.desc: ...Series: The Future is now, thanks to Strategy!: Ash's next World Coronation Series battle is against Drasna of the Kalos Elite Four! But first, he visits Clemont and Bonnie. (S25 Ep13)

programme.title: Pokémon Ultimate Journeys: The...
programme.desc: ...Series: Taking Two for the Team!: The Pokémon World Coronation Series is in full swing! After training with his old friend Clemont, Ash is ready to battle with Dracovish. (S25 Ep14)

programme.title: Pokémon Master Journeys:
programme.desc: The Series: A Midsummer Night's Light! A legendary conflict unfolds as our heroes investigate the source of nightmares in the Sinnoh region! (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Pokémon Master Journeys:
programme.desc: The Series: All Out, All of the Time! When Ash and Goh enter a race in Alola, the other competitors go all out to make it a challenge! (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
programme.desc: Light Spinner: As Shadow Weaver languishes in her Horde prison cell, she recalls her old life as the sorceress Light Spinner and her time in Mystacor with her apprentice, Micah. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Horoscare: Conflicting horoscares/horoscopes predict a visit with Cleo's favorite influencer could go well or terribly wrong. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Flaunt Your Skeleton: Ghoulia's dream and nightmare is about to come true when she is set to perform with superstar alum, Debbie Scary. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Creepover Party: Draculaura, Clawdeen and Frankie meet Twyla, a boogey monster, while spending a night in the library. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: The Ballad of Brunchington Beach: In order to find out more information about her dad's old burrow, Kipo and the team travel to a wretched hive, or to some a fantastic brunch restaurant. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo
programme.desc: Cat's out of the Bag: Uncle Leo's secret life is revealed, and Milo feels betrayed. Milo must take a literal leap of faith to reconcile with Leo and stop Luca from destroying the Guardians. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: Minion Life: The Minions struggle to complete a mission for Luca. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: 100% Human-ish: An energetic Bong Bong intrudes on Shasha's sleep. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Unhappy Camper / The Case of the Triple Inbestigation: When Mr McGillick's phone goes missing at the Grade Five camp, Kyle is accused of hiding it as part of a prank. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Miraculous Mini Golfer / The Case of the Problematic Party: Convinced a customer is cheating to claim a prize, Charlie hires the Inbestigators. (S2 Ep5)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Burgled Bags / The Case of the Distracted Detective: When Gary, the school's lollipop man, is accused of stealing bags from parents' cars, Kyle is devastated. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Kung Fu Sock
programme.desc: Hao's Memory: Hao tries to answer Tee Zeng, but he is confined in his own consciousness. Manipulens points out that Hao walked into his trap voluntarily, but Hao doesn't seem to remember. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Dearest Family: Galette day this year is eventful for Marinette; Tikki is acting very strange and three supervillains show up! (S4 Ep21)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Mission: Mermicorno: Astra, a winged unicorn mermaid known as a Mermicorno, sets out on an adventure to find her missing sister. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: The Monstering Part 1: Human girl, Clawdeen, follows her instincts and discovers Monster High! (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: The Monstering Part 2: When Clawdeen isn't allowed into Monster High because she's human, she devises other ways to get into the school. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Food Fight: Draculaura practices witchcraft illegally so Clawdeen and Frankie help her subdue the tater she brought to life. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Unfinished Brain-ness: Frankie, "cursed" from their brain's past life, gets help from Frankie, Clawdeen, and Draculaura to break it. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Polar Bear: Nutty Hill is suffering from a heat wave. Searching for a bit of cool air, Grizzy has a brilliant idea. He'll get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Spread: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV, he discovers that the pantry is empty! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Cellular Bear: Grizzy's nap is interrupted by the forest ranger's cell phone. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Jurassic Bear: Freed by the thawing ice, a giant egg slides up to the front door of the cabin. The lemmings watch the hatching of a baby dinosaur that soon thinks they are its parents. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness: In order to woo the she-bear he's infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and get into shape with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs: Near the supermarket, a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket. (S1 Ep53)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: As Far as Bear Can Remember: An old metal box found by chance brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. They recall the first time they met, when they were still kids. (S1 Ep55)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Chemical Lemmings: How can Grizzy watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box? (S1 Ep56)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Remote Control: Grizzy's TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. (S1 Ep57)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear and the Butterfly: Grizzy wants to offer a butterfly to the she-bear he's in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens he's spotted. (S1 Ep58)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Get Off My Tennis Shoes: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight! (S1 Ep59)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Babysitting: Grizzy babysits for the bear he has a crush on. There's no question of Grizzy tripping up, for he has no intention of taking any risks! (S1 Ep60)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Lock and Key: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the ranger's brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. (S1 Ep61)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Blues: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. (S1 Ep62)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Snow Lemmings: Grizzy craves ice cream on a hot day, but the Lemmings have used strawberry-vanilla ice cream to create a sled run in the backyard. (S1 Ep63)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Augmented Bear: The Lemmings have discovered a new game: an augmented reality program on the ranger's digital tablet. (S1 Ep64)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Under Pressure: The only edible food left in the ranger's cabin is a salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice in the freezer. Grizzy decides to melt the ice with the blow-dryer. (S1 Ep65)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings in Space: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fireworks. (S1 Ep66)

programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Spinning Tales: Envious of Mouse's admiration for Max, Corto questions the story where Max would have defeated Kumo, a legendary titan spider. Max can't prove it and loses her friends. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Piranicus Race: Enki struggles to be more 'normal'...to the point of forgetting the Thousand Waterfalls race! But the Tikis need his ideas to escape the vicious Piranicus fish... (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Skeleton Key: After hours, Kai helps L.J. search the school for confiscated dice, using a Skeleton Key (Shard)! It opens any door but leads anywhere the keyholder thinks of. (S1 Ep14)

programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Sentibubbler: Shadow Moth creates Sentibubbler, a fearsome Sentimonster that will only stop if Rena Rouge betrays Ladybug and Cat Noir! Will our heroes pass this trust test? (S4 Ep14)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Curry Worries: Romin looks to fix up her friendship with Luke by fixing up some homemade curry! But this could be a recipe for disaster! (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Nightmare Nightmore Part 1: It's Nightmore, the biggest monster holiday! But the boo crew's Nightmore party quickly turns into a nightmare. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Nightmare Nightmore Part 2: Draculaura's Nightmore party is interrupted by an unexpected guest who challenges her beliefs. (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: So Familiar: Draculaura and her friends search for her familiar so she can open the Witchcraft Codex and hone her powers. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Monster High

programme.desc: Pressure Points: Seatbastian feels the pressure when he battles against a massage duellist who looks to knead out a victory! (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: I Have Come Too! Training Begins on Beerus' Planet!: Goku arrives on Beerus' planet to start training, only to find that Vegeta is doing more housework than training! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: Sympathy for the Mandrill: In an episode existing mostly in flashback, Scarlemagne uses the time with captured Kipo to relive his haunting backstory of his life as a science experiment. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Big Moe's Big Race: Big Moe discovers that Mouse, his daughter, is drone-racing! He's adamant : she.must.come.home. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Charm: Grizzy believes that the she-bear he's in love with has been turned into a frog. He looks through the ranger's book of fairytales, searching for a way to turn her back. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear's Best Friend: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon near the log cabin. When the lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Thomas the Tank and friends.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae'r cychod yn bwriadu cynnal regata ond mae'r gwynt yn gostegu. Sut mae creu awel tybed? The boats are planning a regatta when the wind suddenly drops. Can they create a breeze?

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Capten Blero'n chwarae môr-ladron ac yn ystyried pam bod yr hwyaden fach rwber yn arnofio yn hytrach na suddo. Captain Blero wonders why a rubber duck floats instead of sinking on water.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and friends. Today's theme is Trees.

programme.title: This is S4C
programme.desc: This is S4C

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Yn antur heddiw mae Help Llaw yn gwneud llwyfan theatr i'r ffrindiau. All Twm gyfarwyddo drama anhygoel? On today's poptastic adventure, Help Llaw crafts the friends a theatre stage!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw rydyn ni'n ymweld â gwlad Denmarc er mwyn dysgu am y brifddinas Copenhagen, yr awdur enwog Hans Christian Andersen, a bwyd enwog fel crwst Danaidd. Today, we visit Denmark.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae rhywbeth yn bod ar y Jet-faneg, sy'n achosi i Joni symud yn gynt na gweddill y byd. Something is wrong with the Jet-glove, which causes Joni to move faster than the rest of the world.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Seth yn gofyn 'Pwy wnaeth greu geiriau?' ac wrth gwrs mae Tad-cu ag ateb dwl am fachgen ifanc o'r enw Flaximus oedd yn byw yn Rhufain sbel yn ôl. Today's question: 'Who created words?'.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Ffrwyth gwyllt: Mae yna Po yn cael trafferth gwerthu ffrwythau, oherwydd eu bod yn bownsio i ffwrdd! Fruit Oops: A Po finds it difficult to sell fruits, because they keep bouncing away!

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, fe ddown i nabod y morfil glas a'r eliffant Affricanaidd. In this programme, we meet the blue whale and the African elephant.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Trwmped yw gair newydd Ben heddiw. There's plenty of huffing, puffing and blowing to be done when one of the friends is chosen to look for today's word; 'trumpet'.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo wedi dod o hyd i sbectol goll nain, ond ydi'r sbectol wedi torri? Pablo finds Nain's lost spectacles, but they make the world look fuzzy. Are they broken?

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harriet wedi archebu cacen arbennig ar gyfer penblwydd Nain Help Llaw yn 100 oed, ond mae popty'r pobydd wedi torri! Harriet has ordered a special cake, but the baker's oven is broken!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae pawb yn teimlo'n llwglyd heddiw a neb yn fwy na Lleuad. Everyone is hungry, especially Moon.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae na barti mawr i ddathlu agoriad Caffi Cwmtwrch, ond dydi Emrys ddim mewn hwyliau dathlu o gwbl. Today, there is a party to celebrate the opening of the Cwmtwrch's Cafe.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae tad Anni yn gofyn i Anni a Cai i lanhau wedi'r storm fawr ac ma'r ddau'n troi tasg diflas i un llawn hwyl! Anni's father asks Anni and Cai to help with the cleanup after the great storm.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae'r gwencïod yn clywed fod Crawc ofn bwganod brain ac yn manteisio ar y ffaith i ddychryn Crawc allan o'i gartref. The weasels hear of Toad's fear of scarecrows.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Mae edrych ar ol wy yn un o'r petha mwya pwysig all ddewryn bach ddysgu, ond mae'n well gan Odo chwara pel-droed! Caring for an egg is so important to birds but Odo would rather play footie!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn yn mynd a'i ffrindiau i weld hen balas coll! On today's poptastic adventure, Huwcyn is taking the friends to see a long-lost palace!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw bydd yr antur yn mynd â ni i gyfandir Ewrop ac i Wlad Belg. Yma, byddwn ni'n dysgu am brifddinas Brwsel a'i phwysigrwydd i wleidyddiaeth Ewrop, We are in Belgium eating chocolate!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Er nad ydynt yn siarad 'run iaith, mae'r Jetlu a Crwbi'n deall ei gilydd ddigon da i drechu Beti Bowen a'r Cnafon Creulon. The Jetlu and Crubbi unite to defeat Beti Bowen and Cruel Cnafon.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Yn rhaglen heddiw, mae Gweni'n gofyn 'Pam bod parotiaid mor lliwgar?', ac mae gan Tad-cu ateb dwl a doniol am wneuthurwr teganau. Today, Gweni asks 'Why are parrots so colourful?'.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Twt

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol, a chymeriadau newydd sbon fel Clem Clocsio, Myrddin y Dewin a Vanessa drws nesa. Cacamwnci is back with more funny and silly sketches!

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido

programme.title: Cywion Bach

programme.title: Lifeforce
programme.desc: 1985. Horror. Directed by Tobe Hooper. Stars Steve Railsback, Mathilda May & Patrick Stewart. A space shuttle mission investigating Halley's Comet brings back a malevolent race of space vampires. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Our next offering, another brilliant sci-fi horror, is The Man Who Turned to Stone. Caroline Munro presents the strange and frightening 1957 film starring Victor Jory. [S]

programme.title: The Man Who Turned To Stone
programme.desc: 1957. Horror. Director: Leslie Kardos. Stars Victor Jory, William Hudson & Charlotte Austin. 18th century scientists, who have discovered the secret to immortality, take over a girl's reformatory. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: As Caroline Munro prepares to close the doors of The Cellar Club, she provides a glimpse of two more unmissable films coming next week. [S]

programme.title: Hammer House of Mystery and Suspense
programme.desc: Czech Mate. 1984. Stars Susan George, Patrick Mower & Peter Vaughan. Vicky goes to Prague with her ex-husband but soon finds herself alone, penniless and caught up in a murder. [S]

programme.title: Europe in 25 Questions
programme.desc: A rare treat, courtesy of a Dutch airline, about air travel in the 1960s.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed Cuts the Family Tree. 1963. Stars Donna Douglas, Rosemary DeCamp & Bea Benaderet. Mrs. Smith Standish spends more time with the Clampetts, keen to find out if they preceded the 'Mayflower'. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: Object Partimony. Western with Wayne Rogers & Robert Bray, who run a stagecoach line in the Old West where they come across a wide variety of killers, robbers and ladies in distress. [S]

programme.title: Who Goes Next
programme.desc: 1938. War. Director: Maurice Elvey. Stars Barry K. Barnes, Sophie Stewart & Jack Hawkins. During World War One, a number of captured British officers attempt to escape a prisoner-of-war camp. [S]

programme.title: Passport To Treason
programme.desc: 1956. Crime Drama. Directed by Robert S. Baker. Stars Rod Cameron and Lois Maxwell. Clifford, an American private eye, stationed in London for the sake of a murdered friend, takes over a case. [S]

programme.title: The Glass Mountain
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Classic tale of a war romance featuring the smash hit music of The Legend of The Glass Mountain. Stars Michael Denison, Dulcie Gray & Valentina Cortese, with vocals from Tito Gobbi. [S]

programme.title: Father's Little Dividend
programme.desc: 1951. Comedy. Director: Vincente Minnelli. Stars Elizabeth Taylor, Spencer Tracy & Joan Bennett. Stanley Banks is still recovering from his daughter's wedding when he learns that she is pregnant. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Special Licence. 1975. Stars Jennifer Wilson, Jean Anderson & Colin Baker. While everyone's attention is on Edward and Jennifer's wedding, Merroney tries to manipulate Brian's business affairs. [S]

programme.title: City of Bad Men
programme.desc: 1953. Western. Directed by Harmon Jones. Stars Jeanne Crain, Dale Robertson & Richard Boone. After six years in Mexico, an outlaw returns to Nevada, with a plan to rob the Carson City prize-fight. [S]

programme.title: I Love Trouble
programme.desc: 1948. Crime Drama. Directed by S. Sylvan Simon. Stars Franchot Tone, Janet Blair & Janis Carter. A prominent politician hires a private detective to investigate his wife's mysterious past. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Pet Healers/Muncaster Castle. 1995. Michael Aspel presents two unusual stories - the first, about a faith healer who treats pets and the other, about one of Britain's most haunted castles. [S]

programme.title: Danger UXB
programme.desc: Cast Iron Killer. 1979. Stars Anthony Andrews, Judy Geeson & Iain Cuthbertson. A sceptical Brian is ordered to deliver a defused but otherwise intact bomb to Dr.Gillespie.

programme.title: Van der Valk
programme.desc: Destroying Angel. 1972. Stars Barry Foster, Michael Latimer & Susan Travers. Van der Valk and Kroon investigate when a local prostitute reports that a man is dying. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: To Any Lengths. 2003. Stars Bruno Cremer, Martine Sarcey & Maurice Chevit. A man finds a note stating that a fortune teller will die. Shortly after, a fortune teller is found dead. [S]

programme.title: Sex (Re) Education
programme.desc: Stars: Feodor Atkine, Sylwvie Granotier & Irene Jacob. Jacques and Rose want to go away for the weekend, but Isabelle reveals their affair to Rose's son. [S]

programme.title: The Death of Adolf Hitler
programme.desc: 1973. Drama. Directed by Rex Firkin. Stars Frank Finlay, Caroline Mortimer & Oscar Quitak. The story of the last ten days of Hitler's life as his dream of a thousand year Reich became a nightmare. [S]

programme.title: The Death of Adolf Hitler
programme.desc: 1973. Drama. Directed by Rex Firkin. Stars Frank Finlay, Caroline Mortimer & Oscar Quitak. The story of the last ten days of Hitler's life as his dream of a thousand year Reich became a nightmare. [S]

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: 1997. Crime Drama. Directed by Jack Gold. Stars John Thaw, Tom Towndrow & Abigail Cruttenden. A British expatriate in Rhodes investigates the mysterious disappearance of a woman he had befriended.

programme.title: Doctor Morelle
programme.desc: 1949. Mystery. Directed by Godfrey Grayson. Stars Valentine Dyall, Julia Lang & Hugh Griffith. When a young woman mysteriously disappears, her friend turns to Doctor Morelle to help investigate. [S]

programme.title: Tell Me Another
programme.desc: 1976. Stories about Showbusiness Careers. Personal anecdotes as told to Dick Hills. This episode stars Ray Alan, Marti Caine, Thora Hird and David Jacobs. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Women at Sea
programme.desc: 1965. An interesting look at the various seafaring jobs for women - from work on the great passenger liners, to merchant navies, plus a look at Russian women at sea.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Christmas Pudding. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Eugene Deckers. A serial killer sentenced to death threatens to kill Sherlock before the execution. [S]

programme.title: October Moth
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Director: John Kruse. Stars Lee Patterson, Lana Morris & Robert Cawdron, In an isolated Yorkshire farmhouse, a deranged young man imagines a car crash victim is his deceased mother. [S]

programme.title: St. Benny the Dip
programme.desc: 1951. Comedy. Directed by Edgar G. Ulmer. Stars Roland Young, Nina Foch & Dick Haymes. Three con artists unexpectedly wind up on the road to reformation while posing as priests to pull off a job. [S]

programme.title: Aberdeen: The Silver City
programme.desc: A late 60s local authority travelogue showcasing the wonders of the great Scottish city of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Serious Charge
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. A new vicar (Anthony Quayle) falls foul of Hester (Sarah Churchill) as she backs up a false claim made by Larry (Andrew Ray) against the vicar. Cliff Richard sings Living Doll. [S]

programme.title: I Only Arsked!
programme.desc: 1959. Comedy. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Stars Bernard Bresslaw, Michael Medwin & Alfie Bass. A group of misfit soldiers trying to get some leave end up getting posted in the Middle East. [S]

programme.title: Five Days
programme.desc: 1954. Crime. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Stars Dane Clark, Cecile Chevreau & Paul Carpenter. A man on the verge of bankruptcy pays his friend to organise a hit on him, but will his plan pay off? [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Inner Circle - Part 1. 1973. Stars Tom Kempinski, Bernard Brown, Shane Briant. The Sunday Nation newspaper and one of its leading journalists are being sued for libel over a 'harmful' article. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Inner Circle - Part 2. 1973. Stars Jeremy Anthony, Desmond Jordan & Shane Briant. Evidence comes to light about a donation to the group and Martin defends the Inner Circle's intentions. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Inner Circle - Part 3. 1973. Stars Patricia Lawrence, Georgina Ward, Tom Kempinski. Mrs. Peacock tries to explain the benefit of the Open Box community and Megan Watts finally takes the stand. [S]

programme.title: The Four Feathers (1978)
programme.desc: 1978. Drama. Directed by Don Sharp. Stars Beau Bridges, Robert Powell & Jane Seymour. Lieutenant Faversham dishonours his regiment and loses his fiancée, but can he regain his honour and his love? [S]

programme.title: Sea to Plate and Billingsgate
programme.desc: 1956. Documentary on the distribution of fish throughout England. From tower bridge at 6am at Billingsgate in the 1950s to all the little harbours around the coast and everything in between.

programme.title: Sailor of Fortune
programme.desc: The Diamond Chips. 1957. Stars Lorne Greene, Esmond Knight & Teresa Thorne. Mitch winds up in an unpleasant situation when he innocently agrees to sell some jewellery for a girl. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Ships. 1962. Stars John Ireland & Francis De Wolff. A hefty claim is paid to a captain whose ship was lost at sea. Then one of the crew, who supposedly drowned, is found murdered! [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Manoeuvres. 1976. Stars Robin Chadwick, Margaret Ashcroft & Terence Frisby. David makes another attempt to get the better of Paul Merroney and all he needs is Simon Winter's support. [S]

programme.title: Mickey One
programme.desc: 1965. Crime. Directed by Arthur Penn. Stars Warren Beatty, Alexandra Stewart & Hurd Hatfield. A stand-up comic incurs the wrath of the Mafia and escapes to Chicago but yearns to go back on stage. [S]

programme.title: Never Look Back
programme.desc: 1952. Drama. Director: Francis Searle. Stars Rosamund John, Hugh Sinclair, Guy Middleton. A female lawyer puts her reputation on the line to defend her ex-boyfriend who has been accused of murder. [S]

programme.title: Lost Lagoon
programme.desc: 1958. Drama. Directed by John Rawlins. Stars Jeffrey Lynn, Leila Barry & Peter Donat. An unhappy husband dreaming of escape becomes a castaway on an island after his boat runs into a storm. [S]

programme.title: TBN UK Music
